title: Which cloud technology is better? - Quora

response.answer_text: That is an interesting question. Each of the cloud solutions has a strength and a weakness.The strengths are:AWS - first and largest right now. Focused on Opensource solutions.Microsoft - second along with GCP, Enterprise player and long time software companyGoogle - enterprise player second along with MSFT to the marketIBM - long time enterprise playerOracle - long time Enterprise playerThe weakenessAWS - wasn’t an enterprise player when it entered the market, still struggles in the enterprise services spaceMicrosoft, working to embrace opensource but behind in that areaGoogle - great at analytics, way behind in the other servicesIBM - well it is IBM, so with the power of years of enterprise delivery comes the reality of well IBM and the way things are.Oracle, same problems as IBM, (we are oracle) adding to that they are the most expensive.Overall the best, is the cloud that fits what your organization needs.
